sentence.text: This study was undertaken to investigate the prevalence of sequence variants in intraciliary transport in patients with Leber congenital amaurosis (clathrin coat assembly), early-onset retinal dystrophy (EORD), and autosomal recessive retinitis pigmentosa (arRP); to delineate the ocular phenotypes; and to provide an overview of all published intraciliary transport variants in an online database.
Mutations in intraciliary transport are a rare cause of childhood retinal dystrophy accounting for âˆ¼2% of disease in this cohort, and the majority of LCA5 mutations are likely null.
